'''''The Tolkien Quiz Book''''' is a [[1981]] book by [[Nigel Robinson]] and [[Linda Wilson]]. It features questions on all works by [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] that were published at the time: ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', ''[[The Hobbit]]'', ''[[The Silmarillion]]'', ''[[The Adventures of Tom Bombadil]]'', ''[[Unfinished Tales]]'', ''[[Smith of Wootton Major]]'' and ''[[Farmer Giles of Ham]]''.
